        Create a BombeMagnetique.
        Parameters:
        typeElement - Type of the bomb.
        texture - Texture to use.
        activatedTexture - Texture to use when the leurre is active.
        beforeActivatedTexture - Texture to use before the leurre is active.
        durationOfBonusInSeconds - Duration of the leurre.
        x - X position of the bonus.
        y - Y position of the bonus.
